quotes.quote: Speed has never killed anyone. Suddenly becoming stationary, that’s what gets you.
quotes.author: Jeremy Clarkson

quotes.quote: If you want to go fast, go alone. If you want to go far, go together.
quotes.author: African Proverb

quotes.quote: It’s not what you do first that matters, it’s what you do next.
quotes.author: Jennifer Palhka

quotes.quote: Ideas are cheap. Always be passionate about ideas and communicating those ideas and discoveries to others in the things you make.
quotes.author: Charles Eames

quotes.quote: All models are wrong. Some are useful.
quotes.author: George Box

quotes.quote: Writing about music is like dancing about architecture.
quotes.author: Martin Mull
quotes.notes: Commonly attributed to Elvis Costello (plus others), but actual attribution was tracked down by Quotes Investigator (http://quoteinvestigator.com/2010/11/08/writing-about-music/)

quotes.quote: The thing about LA is, the bigger your breasts, the smaller the dog.
quotes.author: Hamish Blake

quotes.quote: I don’t know why people ever, ever try to stop nerds from doing things. It’s really the most incredible waste of time.
quotes.author: Jerry Holkins

quotes.quote: Now I kill you so hard your ancestors will die!
quotes.author: Slick

quotes.quote: When I was a kid... we never went to a play space; the play space began immediately. Play was inspired, not organized.
quotes.author: Louis Kahn

quotes.quote: If you have total freedom, then you are in trouble. It's much better when you have some obligation, some discipline, some rules. When you have no rules, then you start to build your own rules.
quotes.author: Renzo Piano

quotes.quote: I have always believed that art leads the way for architecture. Now it is technology’s turn.
quotes.author: I.M. Pei

quotes.quote: How do you even get a permit to build a city on rock and roll?
quotes.author: Will Ferrell (attributed)

quotes.quote: Everything’s amazing right now, and nobody’s happy.
quotes.author: Louis C.K.

quotes.quote: Another flaw in the human character is that everybody wants to build and nobody wants to do maintenance.
quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.quote: Everything you do in life will be insignificant... but it’s very important that you do it.
quotes.author: Ghandi

quotes.quote: Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful, committed, citizens can change the world. Indeed, it is the only thing that ever has.
quotes.author: Margaret Mead

quotes.quote: Reality is broken. Game designers can fix it.
quotes.author: Jane McGonigal

quotes.quote: Sucking at something is the first step towards being sorta good at something.
quotes.author: Jake the Dog

quotes.quote: Flying is learning how to throw yourself at the ground and miss.
quotes.author: Douglas Adams

quotes.quote: Unless someone like you cares a whole awful lot, nothing is going to get better. It’s not.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: I ain’t happy, I’m feeling glad / I got sunshine, in a bag / I’m useless, but not for long / The future is coming on
quotes.author: 2D, of the Gorillaz

quotes.quote: A city is more than a place in space, it is a drama in time.
quotes.author: Patrick Geddes

quotes.quote: The real magic is taking four strong solo acts and making them all work together, and that's exactly what you did.
quotes.author: Dylan Rhodes

quotes.quote: The smartest city is the one you live in.
quotes.author: Anthony Townsend

quotes.quote: Not everything that can be counted counts, and not everything that counts can be counted.
quotes.author: William Bruce Cameron

quotes.quote: A desk is a dangerous place from which to view the world.
quotes.author: John Le Carré

quotes.quote: The ratio of deliberation to action is too often exhausting—if you have to have an idea, you should just get it down so you can move on to the next big idea.
quotes.author: Mark Lakeman

quotes.quote: You don’t have to move out of your neighborhood to live in a better one.
quotes.author: Majora Carter

quotes.quote: Computer design is quite often merely bad design done on a computer.
quotes.author: Mike Hicks

quotes.quote: There are no big vs small ideas. Just ones you believe in. Don’t waste time guessing their size. Just do them.
quotes.author: Hiroshi Ishii

quotes.quote: The bottleneck is always at the top of the bottle.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: With great power comes a ton of weird crap you are not prepared to deal with.
quotes.author: Skye

quotes.quote: Everything around you that you call life was made up by people that were no smarter than you. And you can change it, you can influence it, you can build your own things that other people can use.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: I love traffic. I love traffic reports because I'm not in any of them.
quotes.author: Jerry Seinfeld

quotes.quote: Never be afraid to try anything new. Remember that a lone amateur built the Ark. A large group of professionals built the Titanic.
quotes.author: Dave Barry
quotes.source: 16 Things That It Took Me Over 50 Years To Learn by Dave Barry (on the event of his 50th birthday), on the wall of a Jimmy John’s

quotes.quote: A statue has never been set up in honour of a critic.
quotes.author: Jean Sibelius
quotes.source: Sibelius: A Close-Up by Bengt de Törne - http://quoteinvestigator.com/2013/08/04/statue-of-critic/

quotes.quote: Our cities are being destroyed by a superstitious religious ritual: the worship of speed and empty space.
quotes.author: Lewis Mumford

quotes.quote: I have not failed. I’ve just found 10,000 ways that won't work.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison (attributed)
quotes.source: As quoted in an ad for GPU Nuclear Corporation, in Black Enterprise Vol. 16, No. 11 (June 1986), p. 79

quotes.quote: If you don’t make mistakes, you aren’t really trying.
quotes.author: Coleman Hawkins (attributed)

quotes.quote: Making the simple complicated is commonplace; making the complicated simple, awesomely simple, that’s creativity.
quotes.author: Charles Mingus

quotes.quote: Before you can think out of the box, you have to start with a box.
quotes.author: Twyla Tharp
quotes.source: The Creative Habit: Learn It and Use It for Life

quotes.quote: Hell is other people's undocumented assumptions.
quotes.author: Frank Chimero

quotes.quote: Games have so much freedom that I can capture everything I want to capture. The other thing is the sense of endlessness, the sense of freedom. You can go anywhere you want.
quotes.author: Jenova Chen

quotes.quote: Things which are different in order simply to be different are seldom better, but that which is made to be better is almost always different.
quotes.author: Dieter Rams
quotes.source: Dieter Rams: As Little Design as Possible
